scripts.build: npm install && npm run update-all && npx astro build
scripts.update-content: node scripts/build-dictionary.mjs && node scripts/migrate-to-internal-structure.mjs && node scripts/chunk-dictionary-for-scale.mjs && echo 'Contenido actualizado con estructura interna'
scripts.update-all: npm run build-dictionary && npm run partition-dictionary && npm run chunk-dictionary && npm run migrate-internal && npm run download-strokes && npm run generate-radicals
scripts.dictionary-legacy: npm run build-dictionary && npm run partition-dictionary
scripts.prepare: command -v pre-commit >/dev/null 2>&1 && pre-commit install || echo 'Pre-commit not available, skipping hooks setup'
